item.fantasy_armor.eclipse_soldier_helme:
§7The armor of an infantryman who fought for the triumph of the eclipse over the sun long ago. 
§7It is said that beneath the boots of the legions thousands of unfortunates have found death.
item.fantasy_armor.eclipse_soldier_chest:
§7The armor of an infantryman who fought for the triumph of the eclipse over the sun long ago. 
§7It is said that beneath the boots of the legions thousands of unfortunates have found death.

item.fantasy_armor.eclipse_soldier_boots:
§7The armor of an infantryman who fought for the triumph of the eclipse over the sun long ago. 
§7It is said that beneath the boots of the legions thousands of unfortunates have found death.
item.fantasy_armor.golden_horns_helmet.t:
§7A set that shines so brightly it appears to be carved from the light itself. 
§7However, its gold is not a blessing but a curse. 
§7This gold has witnessed death and destruction, and its light feeds greed and bloodlust. 
§7This armor serves its owner only as long as he is willing to sacrifice his enemies.
item.fantasy_armor.golden_horns_chestpla:

item.fantasy_armor.dragonslayer_helmet.t:
§7This set is forged from the scales of defeated dragons, each one a symbol of ancient strength and fury.
§7The plates and spikes grant you the power of victory over them, but do not forget that every step taken in it bears the weight of many deaths.

item.fantasy_armor.hero_helmet.tooltip:
§7This set is the legacy of ancient warriors, each of whom fought to their last breath.
§7It holds the memory of countless battles and hardships endured in the search for justice.
§7But glory is a heavy burden.
§7Not every story will endure through the ages.

item.fantasy_armor.thief_helmet.tooltip:
§7This set is the perfect companion for those who live in shadows and breathe darkness.
§7The wearer becomes one with the night.
§7The black mask conceals your face, leaving your enemies guessing.
item.fantasy_armor.thief_chestplate.tool:

§7The wearer becomes one with the night.
§7The black mask conceals your face, leaving your enemies guessing.

item.fantasy_armor.wandering_wizard_helm:
§7This set is infused with ancient magic.
§7The garments whisper forgotten spells and open gates to other worlds.
§7Each thread of this attire binds its wearer to unknown forces, granting him the power to perform magic, but at the same time imposing the curse of eternal wandering without the right to rest.

item.fantasy_armor.sunset_wings_helmet.t:
§7Sunset is both the end and the beginning at the same time.
§7The wings guide their owner through the darkness.
§7When you don them, you become the somber messenger of eternal night.
item.fantasy_armor.sunset_wings_chestpla:

item.fantasy_armor.chess_board_knight_he:
§7Every move is a battle, every step is a strategy.
§7This armor embodies the cold logic and ruthless power of warfare.
§7Wear it with the pride of a strategist, prepared to sacrifice everything for victory, even your soul.

item.fantasy_armor.dark_lord_helmet.tool:
§7Created in the depths of another world, this set is the embodiment of the power of terror.
§7Its spikes and black armor resemble broken fangs.
§7Wear it if you dare, but know that it demands eternal devotion to the darkness and devours those who attempt to resist it.

item.fantasy_armor.fog_guard_helmet.tool: §7Shrouded in ancient fog, this armor offers unmatched protection, but weakens its wearer with visions of lost realms.

item.fantasy_armor.dark_cover_helmet.too:
§7Enveloping its wearer in shadows, this armor grants protection from light and silence, but whispers forgotten secrets of dark forces.
§7Wear it, but heed the shadows' warnings.

§7Forged in the first light, this armor carries warmth and brightness, yet burns those not pure of heart.
§7Only the righteous may unlock its true power.

item.fantasy_armor.golden_execution_helm:
§7Bearing the weight of the empire's wrath, this armor shines golden but is soaked in the blood of the fallen.
§7Wear it with pride, but never forget its cost.

item.fantasy_armor.forgotten_trace_helme:
§7The memory of ancient wars lingers in this armor, haunting the wearer with echoes of battles long lost.
§7Once donned, it marks the wearer as a soul from another age.

item.fantasy_armor.redeemer_helmet.toolt:
§7An armor set created by the old order. 
§7Your god was slain long ago, but your faith has endured. 
§7Knowing very well you will likely not return from your quest, you step forward bravely into the unknown.

item.fantasy_armor.twinned_helmet.toolti:
§7Bound to another in spirit, this armor shares both pain and triumph with its twin.
§7A shared destiny awaits those who wear the full set.

item.fantasy_armor.gilded_hunt_helmet.to:
§7Worn by those who chase honor and glory, this armor reflects the wild ambition of its bearer.
§7Hunt with it, but beware - glory often has a steep price.

item.fantasy_armor.lady_maria_helmet.too:
§7A corpse... should be left well alone. 
§7Oh, I know very well. How the secrets beckon so sweetly. 
§7Only an honest death will cure you now. 
§7Liberate you, from your wild curiosity.

item.fantasy_armor.crucible_knight_helme:
§7Hold the power of the crucible of life. 
§7In time, the strength shown by these knights, and even their appearance, was seen as chaotic and deserving of scorn.

§7Hidden in the night, the shadow knows its place. 
§7Its steps are silent, but the chill of its presence is felt on the skin.

item.fantasy_armor.ronin_helmet.tooltip: §7Steel bears the scars of the past, its patterns soaked with long-cooled blood.

item.fantasy_armor.malenia_helmet.toolti: §7...Heed my words. I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella. And I have never known defeat.

item.fantasy_armor.old_knight_helmet.too:
§7A set of armor once worn by a knight who survived countless battles. 
§7Its weight is unbearable for the weak, but those who endure shall never fall.

§7The armor of an elite warrior who never faltered in battle. 
§7Its silver gleam reflects the moonlight, bringing swift death to those who dare oppose its master.

item.fantasy_armor.dead_gladiator_helmet:

§7His name is forgotten, but fury still burns beneath the steel.

item.fantasy_armor.flesh_of_the_feaster_:
§7This armor reeks of blood and greed. 
§7It once belonged to one who fed without end — and became what he consumed.

item.fantasy_armor.wind_worshipper_helme:
§7The fabric is light as breath. 
§7Worn by those who know no rest, drifting wherever the wind may carry them.

item.fantasy_armor.grave_sentinel_helmet:
§7The armor that guards the sleep of the dead. 
§7Once sworn to noble oaths, over time their duty twisted into a silent vigil among dust and silence.
